    • Method Detail

      • calculateDegree

        public static void calculateDegree(int direction)
        This method calculates the x_speed and y_speed, with the use of following variables: inputAngle, velocity & windFactor.
        Parameters:
        direction - - determines which direction the banana flies.

        1 = from left to right.

        -1 = from right to left.

      • projectory

        public static void projectory(double x,
              double y)
        This method changes the trajectory of the banana by adding x_speed to x and y_speed to y. Furthermore gravity g is also added to y_speed to give the banana a downward direction (over time).
        Parameters:
        x - current X position of banana
        y - current Y position of banana

      • getY

        public static double getY()
        This returns the Y position.
        Returns:
